summary: Bertha von Suttner was an Austrian novelist.
full_text: Bertha Felicitas Sophie Freifrau von Suttner  was a Czech-Austrian pacifist and novelist. In 1905 she was the first woman to be awarded the Nobel Peace Prize, thus being the second female Nobel laureate after Marie Curie's 1903 award, and the first Austrian laureate.
title: Bertha von Suttner
